product_meta.title: AeraWine Infusion Premium Wine Aerator/Pourer, 1-PACK, 100% Made in the USA
product_meta.description:
Package Quantity:1Using The Variable Aerating Feature

• The Aerawine Infusion aerator is unique in many ways. One of the features that makes it more versatile and a "one of a kind" is you can vary the amount of aeration by simply changing the tilt of the bottle. As you red wine lovers know, not all reds need the same level of aerating. Now if you're a bit uncertain about how to determine how much aeration is right for your favorite reds, don't worry, just use the Aerawine Infusion aerator like you would any regular pourer and it will provide satisfying results you will enjoy immediately. If you have a more sensitive palate you can take that bold, full bodied red that needs to breathe a bit before you drink it, and tilt the bottle up for maximum aeration and you will immediately enjoy the results. For the lighter reds, such as a Pinot Noir, less tilt will provide just the right amount of aeration. The great thing is you can decide for yourself. A custom pour every time. 

Aerating Your Wine
